dcterms:creator: Anders S. Christensen
O. Anatole von Lilienfeld
dcterms:description: The revised MD17 (rMD17) dataset contains five train test splits of 10 different small organic molecules. Each of the splits contains 1000 conﬁgurations for each molecule sampled randomly from a long Ab initio molecular dynamics simulation carried out at 500 K computed with DFT.
dcterms:title: rMD17

dcterms:creator: Dávid Péter Kovács
Cas van der Oord
Jiri Kucera
Alice E. A. Allen
Daniel J. Cole
Christoph Ortner
Gábor Csányi
dcterms:description: The 3BPA dataset contains DFT train test splits of a flexible drug-like organic molecule sampled from different temperature molecular dynamics trajectories. The models are trained on 500 snapshots sampled at 300K and tested on three independent test sets for each temperature (300K, 600K, 1200K).
dcterms:title: 3BPA

dcterms:creator: Ilyes Batatia
Simon Batzner
Dávid Péter Kovács
Albert Musaelian
Gregor N. C. Simm
Ralf Drautz
Christoph Ortner
Boris Kozinsky
Gábor Csányi
dcterms:description: The acetylacetone dataset contains trajectories of a small reactive molecule sampled at different temperatures. The task is to train on snapshots sampled at 300K and test on independent test sets sampled at 300K and 600K.
dcterms:title: Acetylacetone
